snippet: A judge halted proceedings on Monday for one of two 12-year-old girls, who are accused of trying to kill a classmate to please a fictional character called Slender Man, while the girl undergoes a competency evaluation
abstract: Minnesota Judge Michael O Bohren halts proceedings for one of two 12-year-old girls, who are accused of trying to kill a classmate in Wisconsin to please fictional character called Slender Man, while girl undergoes competency evaluation.
lead_paragraph: A judge halted proceedings on Monday for one of two 12-year-old girls, who are accused of trying to kill a classmate to please a fictional character called Slender Man, while the girl undergoes a competency evaluation

headline.main: Wisconsin: Evaluation of Girl Ordered in Stabbing Case
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Evaluation of Girl Ordered in Stabbing Case
